AYAN-YUE GUPTA

Home Research Art C.V.

I am a postdoctoral fellow working on the ConsNet project at the Behave Lab, Department of Social and Political Sciences, University of Milan. My research interests cover computational social science, natural language processing, political discourse, neoliberalism, governmentality, discourse analysis, pragmatics, philosophy of language and sociolinguistics.

Before entering academia I was pursuing a career in art, and I still make stuff on occassion. A selection of my artworks can be found here. I also have stuff on my instagram and youtube pages.

E-mail: dm18378@bristol.ac.uk
